Title: The Aftermath
Writer: Joe Shrapnel (screenplay by), Anna Waterhouse (screenplay by), Rhidian Brook (screenplay by), Rhidian Brook (based on the novel "The Aftermath" by)
Actors: Keira Knightley, Ned Wills, Pandora Colin, Jason Clarke
Plot: Post World War II, a British colonel and his wife are assigned to live in Hamburg during the post-war reconstruction, but tensions arise with the German who previously owned the house.
